ER: address:The address field is required.

ER: city:The city field is required.

Title: State empty

ER: postcode:The postcode field must be a string.

Title: Country empty
ER: country:The country field is required.

Title: FirstName too long - 41 characters

Title: LastName too long - 21 characters

Title: Address too long - 71 characters
Address: This is the address that exceeds the limit by having seventy one characters long char
ER: address:The address field must not be greater than 70 characters.

Title: City too long - 41 characters
City: This city name is forty one characters long

Title: State too long - 41 characters

ER: state:The state field must not be greater than 40 characters.

Title: Postcode too long - 11 characters
ER: postcode:The postcode field must not be greater than 10 characters.

Title: FirstName with special characters

Title: Multiple fields with special characters
ER: first_name:The first name field format is invalid|last_name:The last name field format is invalid.

Title: Phone with letters and special chars
ER: phone:The phone field may only contain numbers.

Title: Phone too long - 25 characters
ER: phone:The phone field must not be greater than 24 characters.

Title: Email too long - 61 characters
ER: email:The email field must not be greater than 60 characters.

Title: Email invalid format
ER: email:The email field must be a valid email address.

Title: Password too short - 5 characters
ER: password:The password field must be at least 9 characters.

Title: Password too long - 256 characters
ER: password:The password field must not be greater than 40 characters.

Title: Password no special character
ER: password:The password field must contain at least one special character.

Title: Password no number
ER: password:The password field must contain at least one number.

Title: Password no uppercase
ER: password:The password field must contain at least one uppercase letter.

Title: Password in data leak
ER: password:"The given password has appeared in a data leak. Please choose a different password.
